issue.title: [C++/Python] master Travis CI build is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-225](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-225). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I believe this to be caused by PARQUET-635 for some reason. conda build 662 passed, but 679 (static-libstdc++) failed. I will need to investigate further

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-225?focusedCommentId=15349913) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We are back in business. Reverting the `-static-libstdc++` stuff in parquet-cpp resolved the issue temporarily.
